Race.SpecificTitle: City of Breaux Bridge -- Sell Natural Gas Sys.-Mayor & BOA
Race.SummaryText:
City of Breaux Bridge Proposition

Summary:  Authority for the City of Breaux Bridge, Louisiana to sell its Natural Gas System to Atmos Energy Corporation.
Race.FullText: Shall the City of Breaux Bridge, Louisiana sell its Natural Gas System to Atmos Energy Corporation as per the written proposal of September 11, 2012, on file in the Office of Clerk of the said city?
